mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT JV_NO , JV_TITLE , JV_ADDRESS , M_NAME , EL_NAME , S_NAME , AC_DATE , RB_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AC_DATE,'YYYY.MM.dd')) AC_DATE_FORMAT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RB_DATE,'YYYY.MM.dd')) RB_DATE_FORMAT FROM JOB_VACANCY JV JOIN COMPANY_INFO USING(CI_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING(M_NO) JOIN JOB_VACANCY_EXPERIENCE_LEVEL JVEL USING(JV_NO) JOIN EXPERIENCE_LEVEL EL ON(JVEL.EL_NO=EL.EL_NO) JOIN RECRUITMENT_INDUSTRY RI USING(JV_NO) JOIN SECTOR S ON(RI.S_NO=S.S_NO) LEFT JOIN APPLY_COMPANY USING (JV_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUME_BROWSE RB USING (CI_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUME R ON (R.R_NO = RB.R_NO) WHERE R.M_NO = #{ no } ORDER BY 1 DESC
